label: Description
value: Bust-length portrait in side view facing right, of a young man wearing a high cap. The oval portrait with the simple frame is standing on a base between two columns. From upper left hangs a curtain.

label: Description
value: A bust-length portrait of a middle-aged cardinal in three-quarter view to right. In an oval frame held by two small angels. Part of an entablature decoration composed of stele crest, eff-and-dart and wreath motifs on mouldings.

Portrait of Louise Elisabeth Bourbon, Duchess of Parma, Piacenza and Quastalls

label: Description
value: Bust-length portrait of the Duchess, head turned slightly to left, body to right. She wears large earrings and matching jewels in her hair. Around her shoulders is an ermine stole. The oval frame is supported by an inscribed pedestal.
